item.title: Streaming License for Ring-Press Music Selections — Ring-Press Music
item.description: This license grants your organization the right to livestream or post video recordings of arrangements from Ring-Press. item.title: Transposition services — Ring-Press Music
item.description: Do you need a piece of music lowered or raised? Ring-Press Music can do that for you! item.description: Print as many as you need for your organization. Mark the Advent season with this beautiful, contemplative arrangement of "O Come, O Come Emmanuel" for intermediate level handbell quartet. Using singing bell and LV techniques, this setting evokes the text of the ancient hymn.

item.description: Composer Bob Burroughs has created this festive and joyous fanfare, perfect for 2-octave ensembles that want a fun challenge.

item.title: Passion Dance (5-7 Octaves, Level 6) — Ring-Press Music

item.title: Bells of Joy (Beginning Quartet) — Ring-Press Music
item.description: Print as many as you need for your organization. Bells of Joy is an original composition by Andrew Duncan for beginning quartet. There are no bell changes, and everything in this piece is played with mallets on the table.

item.title: What Wondrous Love Is This - 4 Ringers, Level 2 — Ring-Press Music
item.description: Recording below “What Wondrous Love” can be played by 4 ringers in this beautiful and effective Level 2 arrangement by Andrew Duncan. No bell changes are required, and no tables are needed. There is also a version available for 6 ringers . Duration: 3:10

item.title: Abide with Me (Handbell Duet) — Ring-Press Music
item.description: Print as many as you need for your organization. Barbara Broome has arranged the hymn "Abide with Me" for intermediate-level handbell duet and piano accompaniment. Parts for the ringers and pianist are included, as well as a detailed instruction sheet and layout guide.

item.title: Psalm (4-5 Octaves, Level 3) — Ring-Press Music
item.description: Print as many as you need for your organization. (this title would be $70-$75 in print publishing - you save 50%) Psalm is an original, meditative composition for 4 or 5 octaves of handbells and 2 octaves of optional handchimes by Andrew Duncan. It is rated Level 3.
